page.title: 04Events for the Family
page.content: Capel is a great place for children. A Sports week is held during the summer when most of the sports clubs are closed.Once a year we have a Fun Day -stalls,games and competitions held on the playing field.After certain events there are family evenings in the village hall. During the winter the is a day when synthetic ice is brought to Capel and you can hire skates for the day. One morning in May a Fun Run is held. This is a 3 mile run round Capel.Every year certain societies sponsor the run. Capel St Mary has its own dramatic society,the Orchard Players,who give shows and pantomimes during the year
